// Dialer is authentication provider information.
type Dialer struct {
    Hostname      string `json:"hostname"`
    Port          int    `json:"port"`
    Username      string `json:"username"`
    Password      string `json:"password"`
    PrivateKey    string `json:"privateKey"`
    IgnoreHostKey bool   `json:"IgnoreHostKey"`
    client        *ssh.Client
}

ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰èªè¨¼ã®å ´åˆã¯ Username ã¨ Password ã«ãã‚Œãã‚Œå€¤ã‚’ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã™ã‚‹ã€‚ PrivateKey ã«èªè¨¼ç”¨ã®ç§˜å¯†éµã¸ã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ Password ã«ç§˜å¯†éµã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ•ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚ºã‚’ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã™ã‚‹ã€‚ ã¾ãŸ ssh-agent ç­‰ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ $SSH_AUTH_SOCK ã‚½ã‚±ãƒƒãƒˆã‹ã‚‰ç§˜å¯†éµã‚’å–å¾—ã§ãã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ï¼Œã“ã¡ã‚‰ã‚’å„ªå…ˆã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚

IgnoreHostKey ã« true ã‚’ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã™ã‚‹ã¨ãƒ›ã‚¹ãƒˆèªè¨¼ã‚’ç„¡è¦–ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŒï¼Œã‚»ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£ä¸ŠãŠå‹§ã‚ã§ããªã„ã®ã§ã”æ³¨æ„ã‚’ã€‚ ãƒ›ã‚¹ãƒˆèªè¨¼ã¯ $HOME/.ssh/known_hosts ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«ãƒ›ã‚¹ãƒˆéµãŒç™»éŒ²ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒå‰æã§ï¼Œ known_hosts ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒãªã„ï¼Œã¾ãŸã¯ known_hosts ã«ãƒ›ã‚¹ãƒˆéµãŒãªã„å ´åˆã¯

$ go run main.go

ã¨ã„ã†æ„Ÿã˜ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã«ãªã‚‹ã€‚

ã§ã¯ï¼Œã“ã‚Œã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦å®Ÿéš›ã«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’æ›¸ã„ã¦ã¿ã‚‹ã€‚

github.com/lib/pq + github.com/goark/sshql

ã¾ãšã¯ PostgreSQL ç”¨ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ github.com/lib/pq ã¨ github.com/goark/sshql ã‚’çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›ã‚‹ã¨ã“ã‚ã‹ã‚‰ã€‚ ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã«æ›¸ã‘ã‚‹ã€‚

package main

import (
    "database/sql"
    "fmt"
    "os"

    "github.com/goark/sshql"
    "github.com/goark/sshql/pgdrv"
)

func main() {
    dialer := &sshql.Dialer{
        Hostname:   "sshserver",
        Port:       22,
        Username:   "remoteuser",
        Password:   "passphraseforauthkey",
        PrivateKey: "/home/username/.ssh/id_eddsa",
    }
    pgdrv.New(dialer).Register("postgres+ssh")

    db, err := sql.Open("postgres+ssh", "postgres://dbuser:dbpassword@localhost:5432/example?sslmode=disable")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer dialer.Close()
    defer db.Close()

    rows, err := db.Query("SELECT id, name FROM example ORDER BY id")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    for rows.Next() {
        var id int64
        var name string
        if err := rows.Scan(&id, &name); err != nil {
            fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
            break
        }
        fmt.Printf("ID: %d  Name: %s\n", id, name)
    }
    rows.Close()
}

"postgres+ssh" ã¨ã—ã¦ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒã‚’ç™»éŒ²ã—ï¼ˆåå‰ã¯ä½•ã§ã‚‚OKï¼‰ï¼Œã“ã®åå‰ã‚’ sql.Open() é–¢æ•°ã§æŒ‡å®šã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ãŒãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚ ã‚ã¨ã¯ database/sql ã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’ãã®ã¾ã¾ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹ã€‚

github.com/jackc/pgx ã¯ github.com/lib/pq ã®å¾Œç¶™ã¨ã‚‚è¨€ãˆã‚‹ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚ æ¨™æº– database/sql ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¨çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›ã¦ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ã‚‚å¯èƒ½ã ãŒï¼Œè‡ªèº«ãŒ database/sql äº’æ›ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ•ã‚§ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’æŒã£ã¦ã„ã¦æ›´ã«ç‹¬è‡ªã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚‚æ­è¼‰ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚ PostgreSQL ã«ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã™ã‚‹ãªã‚‰ï¼Œå€‹äººçš„ã«ã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã®ã»ã†ãŒãŠå‹§ã‚ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

æ‹™ä½œ github.com/goark/sshql ã¨çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›ã¦ä½¿ã†ã«ã¯ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨å¤‰å‰‡çš„ãªåˆæœŸåŒ–ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’æ›¸ãã€‚ ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã€‚

package main

import (
    "context"
    "fmt"
    "os"

    "github.com/goark/sshql"
    "github.com/jackc/pgx/v4/pgxpool"
)

func main() {
    dialer := &sshql.Dialer{
        Hostname:   "sshserver",
        Port:       22,
        Username:   "remoteuser",
        Password:   "passphraseforauthkey",
        PrivateKey: "/home/username/.ssh/id_eddsa",
    }

    cfg, err := pgxpool.ParseConfig("postgres://dbuser:dbpassword@localhost:5432/example?sslmode=disable")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    cfg.ConnConfig.DialFunc = dialer.DialContext

    if err := dialer.Connect(); err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer dialer.Close()

    pool, err := pgxpool.ConnectConfig(context.TODO(), cfg)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer pool.Close()

    rows, err := pool.Query(context.TODO(), "SELECT id, name FROM example ORDER BY id")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    rows.Close()

    for rows.Next() {
        var id int64
        var name string
        if err := rows.Scan(&id, &name); err != nil {
            fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
            break
        }
        fmt.Printf("ID: %d  Name: %s\n", id, name)
    }
}

ã¾ãš pgx.ConnConfig ã‚’å«ã‚€ pgx/pgxpool.Config æ§‹é€ ä½“ã‚’ä½œã£ã¦ï¼Œãã“ã« dialer.DialContext() ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚’ç™»éŒ²ã™ã‚‹ã‚¤ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã€‚ pgx ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ³ã™ã‚‹å‰ã« dialer.Connect() ã¤ã¾ã‚Š SSH æ¥ç¶šã‚’æ˜ç¤ºçš„ã«è¨˜è¿°ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

ä¸€è¦‹ã¾ã©ã‚ã“ã—ãè¦‹ãˆã‚‹ãŒï¼Œ pgx/pgxpool.Config æ§‹é€ ä½“ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ logger ç™»éŒ²ã‚’å«ã‚€ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºãŒã§ãã‚‹ã®ã§ï¼Œå®Ÿç”¨ä¸Šã¯ãã‚Œã»ã©è¿‚é ãªã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ã¯ãªã‹ã£ãŸã‚Šã™ã‚‹ã€‚ æ¥ç¶šã”ã¨ã«ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ä½œã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã§ï¼Œã‚°ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ«ã«åå‰ã‚’ã¤ã‘ã¦ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’ç™»éŒ²ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã‚Šåˆç†çš„ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œãªã„ã€‚

github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql + github.com/goark/sshql

MySQL ç”¨ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql ã¨ github.com/goark/sshql ã¨ã®çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›ã¯ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã€‚

package main

func main() {

        Hostname:   "sshserver",
        Port:       22,
        Username:   "remoteuser",
        Password:   "passphraseforauthkey",
        PrivateKey: "/home/username/.ssh/id_eddsa",
    }
    mysqldrv.New(dialer).RegisterDial("ssh+tcp")

    db, err := sql.Open("mysql", "dbuser:dbpassword@ssh+tcp(localhost:3306)/dbname")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer dialer.Close()
    defer db.Close()

    rows, err := db.Query("SELECT id, name FROM example ORDER BY id")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)

    }
    for rows.Next() {
        var id int64
        var name string

            break
        }

    }
    rows.Close()
}

ãŸã ã—ï¼Œã“ã‚Œã¯ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã‹ã‚‰ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã«ç›´çµã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã§ï¼ŒãŸã¨ãˆã° VPS å†…ã® RDBMS ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã« SSH çµŒç”±ã§ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯å°‘ã—å·¥å¤«ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚ ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã„ã“ã¨ã« PostgreSQL ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã« SSH çµŒç”±ã§ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ mattn ã•ã‚“ãŒå…¬é–‹ã—ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚

  • mattn/pqssh
  • Go ã§ SSH è¶…ã—ã« PostgreSQL ã«æ¥ç¶šã§ãã‚‹ database/sql ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒã‚’ä½œã£ãŸã€‚

ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã‚„ 🙇

ã§ï¼Œå®Ÿã¯ MySQL ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã« SSH çµŒç”±ã§ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã§ããŸã®ã§ï¼Œä¸Šã®ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’å‚è€ƒã«è‡ªä½œã—ã¦ã¿ãŸã€‚

  • goark/sshql: Go SQL drivers over SSH

ã“ã®ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã«æ›¸ã‘ã‚‹ã€‚

package main

import (
    "database/sql"
    "fmt"
    "os"

    "github.com/goark/sshql"
    "github.com/goark/sshql/mysqldrv"
)

func main() {
    dialer := &sshql.Dialer{
        Hostname:   "sshserver",
        Port:       22,
        Username:   "remoteuser",
        Password:   "passphraseforauthkey",
        PrivateKey: "/home/username/.ssh/id_eddsa",
    }
    mysqldrv.New(dialer).RegisterDial("ssh+tcp")

    db, err := sql.Open("mysql", "dbuser:dbpassword@ssh+tcp(localhost:3306)/dbname")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer dialer.Close()
    defer db.Close()

    rows, err := db.Query("SELECT id, name FROM example ORDER BY id")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    for rows.Next() {
        var id int64
        var name string
        if err := rows.Scan(&id, &name); err != nil {
            fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
            break
        }
        fmt.Printf("ID: %d  Name: %s\n", id, name)
    }
    rows.Close()
}

MySQL ã®å ´åˆ SSH ã§ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã® Dialer ã‚’ç™»éŒ²ã—ã¦ï¼Œç™»éŒ²æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’ DSN ã«å«ã‚ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

ã•ã‚‰ã«ï¼Œã“ã®ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸ PostgreSQL ã¸ã® SSH è¶Šã—ã®ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã¯ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã«æ›¸ã‘ã‚‹ã€‚

package main

import (
    "database/sql"
    "fmt"
    "os"

    "github.com/goark/sshql"
    "github.com/goark/sshql/pgdrv"
)

func main() {
    dialer := &sshql.Dialer{
        Hostname:   "sshserver",
        Port:       22,
        Username:   "remoteuser",
        Password:   "passphraseforauthkey",
        PrivateKey: "/home/username/.ssh/id_eddsa",
    }
    pgdrv.New(dialer).Register("postgres+ssh")

    db, err := sql.Open("postgres+ssh", "postgres://dbuser:dbpassword@localhost:5432/example?sslmode=disable")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer dialer.Close()
    defer db.Close()

    rows, err := db.Query("SELECT id, name FROM example ORDER BY id")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    for rows.Next() {
        var id int64
        var name string
        if err := rows.Scan(&id, &name); err != nil {
            fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
            break
        }
        fmt.Printf("ID: %d  Name: %s\n", id, name)
    }
    rows.Close()
}

// InsecureIgnoreHostKey returns a function that can be used for
// ClientConfig.HostKeyCallback to accept any host key. It should
// not be used for production code.
func InsecureIgnoreHostKey() HostKeyCallback {
    return func(hostname string, remote net.Addr, key PublicKey) error {
        return nil
    }
}
